channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Essential Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Essential Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-5595|2024-08-02T06:00:06.949Z -- unknown -- essential%20blocks
item.description: The Essential Blocks WordPress plugin before 4.7.0 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
